messages.subject: commercial message - new items at ricecracker.com
messages.msgSnippet: Just listed several nice swords: C-8 Tanto - Tegai Kanehisa NBTHK C-1 Katana - 28.6 Inch long Munekage C-16 Wakizashi - Naginata zukuri Hizen Masahiro MS-44
messages.messageBody:
Just listed several nice swords:
C-8 Tanto - Tegai Kanehisa NBTHK
C-1 Katana - 28.6 Inch long Munekage
C-16 Wakizashi - Naginata zukuri Hizen Masahiro
MS-44 Wakizashi - Oei Bizen Norimitsu
MX-36 Okisssaki Koto Higo Mounted Katana
MS-42 Rare Tanto By Hojoji Masateru NBTHK
MS-43 Satsuma Wakizashi Mounted - Motohira
New fittings also added:
FT-26 Kogai - 3rd Goto Master Joshin NBTHK Certified
FT-42 Menuki - Goto Catfish and Gourd
FT-41 Menuki - Rare Subject Cat Goto Set
FT-44 Menuki - Rare Iron Shishi Set
FT-40 Menuki - Rare Old Elephant Set - Perhaps Ezo
and more will be going up shortly.
Please take a look at www.ricecracker.com <http://www.ricecracker.com>
and email me if you have any questions.
Regards,
John Kurata



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
